channel.name: Channel News Asia IN
channel.title: Daughters of Putien
channel.desc: Between the 1970s and 1990s, tens of thousands of unwanted baby girls are sold to Putien, Fujian. The families that buy them have a clear goal: one day they are to marry their foster brothers.
